T02D3080:176a-0: @176a ` // s'atstsha lnga gdab pa'i cho ga bzhugs /
T02D3080:176a-2: * // de nas khrus byas gos gtsang bgos //
T02D3080:176a-3: spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya //
T02D3080:176a-4: mchod rten lnga gdab gro ga la //
T02D3080:176a-5: 'khor lo bya ru rdzogs par bya //
T02D3080:176a-6: ba dan gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sogs //
T02D3080:176a-7: me tog phreng bas brgyan pa ni //
T02D3080:176a-8: dbus dang grva la bzhugs su gsol //
T02D3080:176a-9: bum pa gang ba bzhi la ni //
T02D3080:176a-10: byin gyis brlabs la phyogs bzhir gzhag / rma bya'i sgro lnga'i mu men dang //
T02D3080:176a-11: spos kyi sdong po snod bzhi yang //
T02D3080:176a-12: gra la legs par gzhag par bya //
T02D3080:176a-13: mchod yon spos dang me tog tshogs //
T02D3080:176a-14: mar me dri dang lha bshos dang //
T02D3080:176a-15: rol mo sna tshogs re ga byas mchod //
T02D3080:176a-16: aa las byung ba'i ngo mtshar mchog / thugs ni nam mkha' sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D3080:176a-17: gtsug tor dri med snying po'i mchog yid bzhin nor bu khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D3080:176a-18: shes rab mchog gyur 'jam pa'i mgon //
T02D3080:176a-19: aa la la ho ngo bo'i chos //
T02D3080:176a-20: yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog 'byung ba //
T02D3080:176a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub //
T02D3080:176a-23: thugs rje'i mchog tu gyur pa ni //
T02D3080:176a-24: yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mtshungs //
T02D3080:176a-26: snying rje chen po'i mchog gyur pa //
T02D3080:176a-27: dri med dag pa'i snying po'i sku //
T02D3080:176a-29: spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3080:176a-30: bdud rnams 'joms pa'i rdo rje can //
T02D3080:176b-0: thugs kyi rdo rje yid bzhin @176b tshul ;
T02D3080:176b-1: / nad rnams sel ba sman pa'i mchog / phyag na rdo rjer phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3080:176b-2: sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang //
T02D3080:176b-4: bsngo dang gsol gdab 'dod don zhu //
T02D3080:176b-5: gang 'dod pa yi las la 'jug / rgyun dang nar mar tshogs bsag bya /
T02D3080:176b-6: d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3080:176b-8: // / dang por sems bskyed la gang la dmigs pa'i bsam rgyud dang bcas par bya'o //
T02D3080:176b-9: dang por bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D3080:176b-10: gtsug tor dri ma med pa la sogs pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsams la ;
T02D3080:176b-11: mchod pa rgya chen po dngos su dbul lo //
T02D3080:176b-12: de rnams kyis kyang bdag dang bum pa nad pa'am
T02D3080:176b-13: gang la sgrub par byed pa de la byin gyis
T02D3080:176b-14: rlob par gsol ba gdab pas byin gyis rlob par
T02D3080:176b-15: bsam mo // bum pa kha rgyan dang bcas pa de la rang yang khrus bya /
T02D3080:176b-16: gso sbyong la sogs pa gtsang mar byas la gzungs tshar brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
T02D3080:176b-17: de nas gang la dmigs pa de la de bzhin
T02D3080:176b-18: gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par bsams
